revision.comment: /* top */ clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix (2), SK SK hynix → SK hynix (2)

|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5PS1G83EFR; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->

}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "TOPKICK028I/128I REV 3.0" and "2010.06.10" :is silkscreened on the board.
4x USB ports are contained on a daughterboard with :hub controller chip connected via 10-pin header.
==See also== *[[Verbatim PowerBay]] *[[Verbatim MediaShare]] (097159) • B003ES4NIA *[[Verbatim MediaShare Mini]] (97329) • B0047T7PTO *[[Verbatim MediaShare Wireless]] (98243) • B00CZ0P0PS *[[Verbatim MediaShare Wireless Mini]] (49160) • B01GVZ56T2
